author: treyzania
content: I don't think that was the intention of SSV was it?  I thought it was mainly so you could run a validator on multiple different machines cooperatively so as to avoid supply chain attacks

author: potuz
content: Yeah certainly SSV were designed to solve a different problem. But it does solve the "poor man's staking pool" problem of staking with less than 32ETH by distributing the trust instead of concentrating it in one operator
